testsuite.name: com.project.automationqa.tests.ProductBrowsingTest

testcase.name: testProductBrowsingAndFiltering
testcase.system-out: Starting testProductBrowsingAndFiltering test Navigated to products page Applied Women > Dress filter Verified filtered products contain 'dress' keyword

testcase.name: testClickOnFirstProduct
testcase.system-out: Starting testClickOnFirstProduct test Navigated to products page Clicked on first product Retrieved product details - Name: Blue Top, Price: Rs. 500 Verified product details are valid

testcase.name: testViewProductDetails
testcase.system-out: Starting testViewProductDetails test Navigated to products page Clicked view product button Verified product availability in detailed view: Availability: In Stock

testcase.name: testAddToCartWithIncreasedQuantity
testcase.system-out: Starting testAddToCartWithIncreasedQuantity test Navigated to products page Clicked on first product Increased product quantity to 2 Added product to cart Navigated to products page Clicked on first product Increased product quantity to 2 Added product to cart Verified items in cart

testcase.name: testAddToCartWithMaximumQuantity
testcase.system-out: Starting testAddToCartWithMaximumQuantity test Navigated to products page Clicked on first product Set product quantity to maximum (10) Added product to cart Verified items in cart

testcase.name: testAddToCartWithMinimumQuantity
testcase.system-out: Starting testAddToCartWithMinimumQuantity test Navigated to products page Clicked on first product Set product quantity to minimum (1) Added product to cart Verified items in cart
